ygData.subject: Re: HI and Befallen question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok help! I went into befallen and killed all the skellies on the first floor and sat and waited for a foreman to pop...nothin!!!! I went in and killed a few
ygData.messageBody:
Ok help! I went into befallen and killed all the skellies on the
first floor and sat and waited for a foreman to pop...nothin!!!! I
went in and killed a few necros and the shadowknight to get the key
for door A and went in there for a while and bashed but still noooo
foremans. Anybody know??

Cahlia




--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., timmye_ea <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> The good news is that the skeletal excavator's you have to kill to
> get the foreman to pop are found on the first floor. They are not
> behind any doors, so it's just a good ol' find 'em and whack 'em
> event. When the foreman pops, he does a zone wide saying and
appears
> towards the back on the first level, between the two skulls in the
> wall. Kill him and Sir A will spawn in the same spot.
>
> Befallen is decent. I still visit it with my 28 war once in a
while.
> On the way to the 2nd level, that is when you will find much more
> sks, necros, and mummies. They will swarm you. But since this quest
> can be done with out going down there or through any doors, you
> should be fine.
>
> Timmye Cousteau
> 39 Druid
> The Rathe
>
> --- In theeverquesttavern@y..., fire_n_butterfly <no_reply@y...>
> wrote:
> > Hi to all. Cahlia here, 19th season wood elf druid, who is trying
> > desperately to level to 20 and claim my surname heheh! Oy I hate
> > taking 1 step forward and 2 steps back!!
> >
> > Anyhow, I was looking up a quest yesterday and found one I am
> > interested in. Starts in Felwithe talking to the high elf who
> stands
> > by the water and tells you he is troubled by his son's
> disappearance,
> > please talk to someone else. I found that if you go to Befallen
and
> > kill a skeletal foreman, it will spawn Sir (something or other
> starts
> > with an A). I got the directions, etc. He gives you a token you
> take
> > back and give to the high elf and he gives you his daughter's
> token.
> > A pretty cool amulet with 3AC, +3wis, +3int, +3 cha, +3Sta, and
+3
> > agi I do believe. Anyhow....here's my question...can I make it in
> > Befallen at level 20 ok? I'm scared from what I read to attempt
it.
> > Apparently everything aggros terribly. EQAtlas says level 7-25+
> mobs,
> > but since they are all necros and thermagists, the damages are
much
> > worse than they con. I HATE dying, and I'm too chicken to attempt
> > without some feedback. Any suggestions or stories?
> >
> > Thanks!
> > Cahlia
> > 19th Season,Wood Elf Druid of Tunare
> > Morrel Thule Server
> > <Fates of Destiny>
